welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kabul, a city steeped in rich history and vibrant culture. Get ready to explore its ancient bazaars, stunning mosques, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your time in this enchanting city!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Khwaja Rawash Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
